title: Select a custom resolution and set it to smart size also for RDP session
author: phantomftr
body_snippet: I have my RDP sessions set to display at 1920x1080 and when I start the session in the main window it is too big so I need to then right click the session tab and select smart size so it fits into the window space properly.  I then sometimes switch these to full screen which is why I need to hard code them at 1920x1080 to fit the full screen.  If I just set the session to smart size it will not take the full screen space when going full screen and if I set the session to full screen it will disc...

comments.snippet: I think smart size must be a on/off check box in config panel
comments.author: MaxSurtaev
